mdRecord.dcterms:title: Interior of Hot-House
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882 (possible)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Glass negative of stereoscopic view of the interior of the conservatory or hot house which sits in the spot of Washington's greenhouse. Plants sold by the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association sit upon wooden stands. Possibly by Alexander Gardner, 1866-1875. Remnants of tape are visible along the edges of the glass.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
